Reviews.Title: “Not a 4 Stars Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Igor M
Reviews.Content: hotel localization meters subway station star standard breakfeast poor wake late wont eat staff polite bathrooms clean

Reviews.Title: “Bad & Sad”
Reviews.Author: Karin181
Reviews.Content: booked hotel reasonably priced flight hotel deal hoped hotel website arrival greeted unfriendly manner instead hello ciao whatever concierge yelled austria drop luggage afternoon ready ready concierge answered dont started call travel agency suddenly told ready 1 hour run veneer wallpaper peeling stains carpets bath moldy smell air condition water pressure ok friends condition substantially hotel 30 past prime breakfast coffee instant brew scrambled eggs tasted plastic found nice bar street breakfast bus subway corner

Reviews.Title: “TERRIBLE”
Reviews.Author: macgyver3
Reviews.Content: ninth floor terriblethe walls bathroom fungus elevator stops 8 floor luggages door burgled windows safety exact locking windows lot argument changed day floor little close 4 stars hotel

Reviews.Title: “Ok for a short stay”
Reviews.Author: missyb_11
Reviews.Content: reading reviews expecting worst expected clean plumbing tv etc stayed 2 nights nice day sleep found staff bit rude looked disbelief inroom safe key pay deposit breakfast spread nice lots yummy pastries overall nice sleep breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Horrid”
Reviews.Author: AlJonAustralia
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 2010 arriving noticed slight smell window air bit dinner 10pm smell horrible physically sick stomachs bad people staying door bad offered stay instead smell staying double bed singles pushed common europe admit beds ditch middle sleeping crack beds breakfast dinner ok fine bit outdated 5 schools staying couldnt believe allow children stay five star hotel rome school camp stayed hours lot people disrupted running stairs screaming children left lot hotel bit lucky dip ok horrid

Reviews.Title: “Avoid this hotel”
Reviews.Author: cemozBrussels
Reviews.Content: hotel 4 stars italian miracles 2star hotel imagine filthy dirty service yes rates low sell size local beer 4 euros door local pizzeria buy double size beer half cost wait 15 minutes sell internet 6 euros day 48 hours practically insulation sleeping difficult noise coming street coming youngsters staying hotel 4 days stayed cleaned shower cabin avoid hotel

Reviews.Title: “Marsha, Marsha, Marsha”
Reviews.Author: TravelingOYEster
Reviews.Content: pictures tell story arrived day friend single decorated florence henderson overlooked pigeon poop cigarette butts hairdryer cord ripped half door didnt shut properly safe didnt night double friend arrived sink screeched toilet wouldnt stop running didnt choose hotel tour rome time beds sunk hurt hell internet apparently started 2 weeks wasnt fixed

Reviews.Title: “This hotel smells like a sewer.”
Reviews.Author: StarBrigt7
Reviews.Content: regent hotel beautiful city rome stop tour mediterranean unlike hotel lengthy trip actually bathroom clean thats positive tour bus pulled curb bus sounded chorus sighs relief hotels wed stayed looked heaven outside unfortunately minute door nightmare roar coming air conditioner sound loud explode minute wed inside ten minutes noticed smelled sulfur throughout remainder stay hotel smell worse bad trouble sleeping night sound emanating ac didnt help hotel regent isnt conveniently located theres free wifi breakfast buffet rave overall id unless enjoy smell sewer stay

Reviews.Title: “you get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: Karin32
Reviews.Content: rome standards deal regent center train 2 stops spanish steps 15 min 910 bus termini station hotel seen days changed bath ac ok beds soft suffering breakfast ok instant coffee drinkable street corner square bar serving wonderful illy coffee fresh pastries italian style coffee cornetto arrived treated incredibly rude greeting consierge yelled austria ready till 4 luggage stay friendly encounters eye rolling breakfast staff desk nicer rome spend bit stay else

Reviews.Title: “ok - but you must be able to overlook some things”
Reviews.Author: akl74
Reviews.Content: hotel bad qualities location fine service friendly breakfast decent maybe stayed curdled eggs cappuccino latte croissants truly quiet despite youths checked time complain noise ac fine cold slept night beds fine mattresses possibly hotel run apparent furniture dents scrapes wood tables night stands wonders people damage furniture cleanliness minus constantly feeling uncleanliness shouldnt happen 4star hotel carpeted floor dirty red stain front bed told merely spill reddish looking drink days looked gigantic blood stain bathroom huge greenish water stains floor shower yellowish stains toilet bathroom appear unclean funny shower doors close water kept spilling floor caused flood time showered manages overlook relatively ok stay hotel experience terrible goes rome rome city superlatives stay hotel day

Reviews.Title: “A four stars hotel?? Maybe 20 years ago!”
Reviews.Author: minettobia
Reviews.Content: traveled business internet connection job choosed hotel web site mention internet connection included facilities true pay minimum 6 € day complained director letter ignored complain anyway hotel poor standard building crumbling environment noisy breakfast poor naive tourist accept standard 4 stars hotel rates supposed stay week left 2 days
